title: [GAMEPLAY] Ionian boots of lucidity having weird effects on summoner spell cooldown.
body:
Ionian boots of lucidity are supposed to offer 10% cooldown reduction on summoner spells.

When starting a game with the Insight mastery, your summoner spells have a 15% reduced cooldown; flash will go from 300 seconds -> 255 seconds, as seen here:

http://i.imgur.com/9XPTArC.jpg

When purchasing Ionian boots of lucidity, your summoner spell cooldown appropriately is reduced a further 10% (255 seconds -> 225 seconds)

http://i.imgur.com/qxQ1tzv.jpg

However, the second you level up, your summoner spell cooldowns increase back up by 10% [notice i have gained one level since the last picture] (flash goes up to 255 seconds from 225 seconds)

http://i.imgur.com/EG9aoXH.jpg


I also learned that if you sell your ionian boots of lucidity, your summoner spell cooldown will go up again (flash goes from 255 seconds -> 285 seconds), which should not be the case when I have 15% reduced cooldowns from the insight mastery

The picture below shows my summoner spell cooldown post-bug, where I have bought the boots and levelled up. The picture after that shows what happens when I sell the boots.

http://i.imgur.com/SgSk374.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/JIR4ZoX.jpg



NOTE: This bug MUST exist between the interactions of Ionian boots and the Insight mastery. The bug is not present when you do not have the insight mastery and only have your summoner spells reduced by your boots, as proven below.

The first picture shows the normal, no-mastery summoner spell cooldown. The picture after shows the summoner spell cooldown even after I have levelled up once with the boots.

http://i.imgur.com/TiJ9shw.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/Hwsk96r.jpg



TL;DR

1. Get Insight mastery (reduces summoner spell cooldowns by 15%) (flash 300seconds -> 255 seconds)
2. Buy Ionian boots of lucidity (reduces summoner spell cooldowns by 10%) (flash 255 seconds -> 225 seconds)
3. Level up once - your summoner spell cooldowns will go up by 10%. (flash 225 seconds -> 255 seconds)
4. If you sell your boots, your summoner spell cooldowns will go up again to a weird, not-possibly number (255 seconds -> 285 seconds)

replies.body: Yo, thanks for the super well-written report! We are aware of the issue, just wanted to let you know that we are looking into a fix. :)

>
> Yo, thanks for the super well-written report! We are aware of the issue, just wanted to let you know that we are looking into a fix. :)

Thank you for giving traditional supports a fighting chance in the vision war for season 6!

Also I am not sure if restricted to Evelyn but when playing her the hud starts glitching and I can see all of the layered pixels that go into animating it.

While hardly game breaking it is damn ugly

I've also had boots of lucidity not apply to TP at all if I have the mastery. just the one time it happened, then I never bought the boots again if i had the mastery... thought it was meant to be not redudant, since it didn't get applied :(
Gotta agree with Riot Time Wizard on how detailed this report is. How much time and effort did it take for you to glean this much information about the bug?

> [{quoted}](name=Renascent,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=sYkTHFtd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-17T04:55:07.901+0000)
>
> Gotta agree with Riot Time Wizard on how detailed this report is. How much time and effort did it take for you to glean this much information about the bug?

Only about twenty minutes, I've noticed it since the patch and figured I'd look into what could be causing it/how to reproduce it. Thankfully it didn't take too long to get an easy reproduction, and after that I just toyed with anything that interacts with summoner spell cooldowns (mastery + selling the boots) and see the results. That kind of information could be helpful for the devs when looking for the cause, so I included as much as I could find.
Sorry to speak off topic, but how's Janna in the preseason, compared to before?

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=sYkTHFtd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-17T02:51:37.431+0000)
>
> Sorry to speak off topic, but how's Janna in the preseason, compared to before?

Traditional supports in general are less of a burden when picked into tank/pick supports now. With the new frost queens claim, new trinket options, and cheaper pink wards, traditional supports are better equipped to fight in the vision war. She was in an okay spot before, she's in a good spot now, but I'd still like to find out how much her passive skews her power, and if it's worth nerfing it to give her cool effects somewhere else on her kit. 

AP items being more expensives sucks a little for players like me who enjoy stacking AP on her (death cap costing 3800 fml). Overall though, definitely a buff.
